author: benh
msg: Updates to scheduler interface to give feedback on when drivers aren't running. Also commiting patch functionality for catching Java exceptions (silly SWIG).

author: benh
msg: Preemptive possible bug fix ... if terminate is set on underlying SchedulerProcess but it doesn't terminate because it is waiting inside a receive.

author: benh
msg: This commit makes Nexus no longer teminate a framework when one of it's executors dies.

author: benh
msg: Updates to keep ZooKeeper (libprocess timing bug) and added support for passing doubles instead of time_t to libprocess functions.
